title: Sheikh Aftab calls for immediate appointment of PBM MD
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 05 (APP): Former Federal Minister Sheikh Aftab Ahmed on Thursday called for the urgent appointment of a Managing Director for Pakistan Bait-ul-Mal (PBM) to ensure the smooth functioning of the organization.
Speaking in the National Assembly, he highlighted how the absence of the MD is negatively impacting the departmentâ€™s operations, leaving the poor and needy without adequate support.
Sheikh Aftab recalled the effective functioning of PBM during the tenure of Muhammad Nawaz Sharif, emphasizing the critical role the organization played in providing welfare assistance to the underprivileged.
